mapper.select: SELECT id, notice_id, title, content, info, state, publish_time, update_time, create_time FROM f_f_notices WHERE state = 1 ORDER BY publish_time DESC
SELECT id, notice_id, title, content, info, state, publish_time, update_time, create_time FROM f_f_notices WHERE state = 1 AND notice_id=#{noticeId} AND title=#{title} ORDER BY publish_time DESC
SELECT id, notice_id, title, content, info, state, publish_time, update_time, create_time FROM f_f_notices WHERE state = 1 ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{to}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_f_notices (notice_id, title, content, info, state, publish_time, update_time, create_time) VALUES (#{noticeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{info}, #{state}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW())
